segments.text: You mean it shuts off to save energy ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , it is . Look at the little light ! It blinks off and on .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Jen , it's not alive ... but it does look user-friendly .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would look so cool carrying this around !
segments.speaker: S2
